name: Mussels Marinara With Penne
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the penne and cook until al dente, about 10 minutes. Drain and toss with the mussels marinara. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
